titleStmt.title: Divine opticks or, a treatise of the eye, discovering the vices and virtues thereof; as also how that organ may be tuned. Chiefly grounded on Psal. 119. 37. By Robert Dingley, M.A. and minister of Gods word at Brixton, alias Brison, in the isle of Wight; formerly Fellow of Mag. Col. Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Dingley, Robert, 1619-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for H. Cripps, and L. Lloyd, and are to be sold at their shop in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octob: 12."; the second 5 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "4".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
